content.p: * Research Excellence Framework (REF) 2021 The school has close ties to several other departments across our campuses in the UK, Malaysia and China, including: A quantum leap for brain imaging Learn more Long live the tomato Learn More How community pharmacists are protecting millions across the globe University Park The University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD For all enquires please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
